location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 25 from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire, to Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter outlines the current arrangements for the provision of water for the Bushire Residency, and suggests that it may be improved through the application of a horse and cart to this task.
